original: Kalm, Karl Ingvar, kyrkoherde, Sturefors, f. 23/8/07 i Atvid, östergötl. L, av Karl Johansson o. Alma Kalm. G. 33 m. Hanna Teresia An-derman. Barn: Sven f. 34, Olle 36, Astrid 39, Birgitta 43. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 28, teol. fil. ex. 28, teol. kand. 30, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f, Lin-’köp. »stift 31, teol. lic. 41. V. koimmin. i Gladhammar 31, -kommin. diär 33’, i Eksjö 3S, kyrkoh. i Vist sed. 42. Ordf. i Gladhammars folks’k :styr. 33-37, led. av Vists barnav:nd, pens :nd, fattig-v:styr. o. nykterh:nd sed. 42, ordf. i skolstyr. o. kyrkofullm. sed. 43.
translated: Kalm, Karl Ingvar, pastor, Sturefors, born 23/8/07 in Atvid, Östergötland County, son of Karl Johansson and Alma Kalm. Married in 1933 to Hanna Teresia Anderman. Children: Sven, born in 1934, Olle, born in 1936, Astrid, born in 1939, Birgitta, born in 1943. Education: High school graduate in Uppsala in 1928, Bachelor of Theology in 1928, Master of Theology in 1930, practical theology exam and ordained priest in the Linköping Diocese in 1931, licentiate in theology in 1941. Assistant pastor in Gladhammar from 1931, assistant pastor in Eksjö from 1933, vicar in Vist since 1942. Chairman of the Gladhammar People's Board from 1933 to 1937, member of the Vist Children's Committee, Pension Committee, Poor Relief Committee, and Temperance Committee since 1942, chairman of the School Board and Church Council since 1943.
